title: More work is needed
review:
The paper suggests a new way of sampling mini-batches for training deep neural nets. The idea is to first index the samples then select the batches during training in a sequential way. The proposed method is tested on the CIFAR dataset and some improvement on the classification accuracy is reported.

I find the idea interesting but feel that much more is needed in order to have a better understanding of how the proposed method works, when it works and when it doesn't work. Some theoretical insight, or at least a more systematic experimental study, is needed to justify the proposed method.
